long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the vTxAnnotator Chrome Extension, powered by VirtualTx!
This handy utility overlays directly on top of your current screen or browser tab, providing you with a range of annotation tools to enhance your browsing experience. With features such as Freeform Draw (Pencil), Arrow, Text and Eraser, you'll have everything you need to create detailed annotations and markup directly on the screen.
The Freeform Draw (Pencil) tool allows you to create freehand drawings and sketches with ease. Simply select the tool and begin drawing directly on the screen. With a range of brush sizes and colors, you can create everything from simple annotations to detailed illustrations.
The Arrow tool is perfect for pointing out specific elements on the screen. Use it to highlight important areas or to draw attention to specific sections of a web page. With the ability to adjust the size, color and style of your arrows, you can ensure that your annotations are clear and easy to read.
The Text tool is ideal for adding notes, labels or comments to your annotations. Simply select the tool, type your text and place it anywhere on the screen. With a range of fonts, sizes and colors available, you can create annotations that are both informative and visually appealing.
Finally, the Eraser tool allows you to quickly and easily remove any annotations that you no longer need. Whether you're tidying up your work or starting over from scratch, the Eraser tool is a handy way to keep your annotations clean and organized.
Overall, the  vTxAnnotator Chrome Extension is a must-have tool for anyone who needs to annotate or markup their browsing experience. So why wait? Download it now and start annotating today!
